response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am delighted to present our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance your business operations and potentially increase your profits by millions. Given its immense value to you, I am offering it for a special introductory price of $950,000. This exclusive offer is designed to provide you with an opportunity to acquire a game-changing asset at a highly favorable rate.

Please consider this proposal carefully. Should you require any further information or have questions about the product, feel free to reach out to me directly. I am more than happy to provide you with all the necessary details to make an informed decision.

Thank you for considering our product. I look forward to the possibility of working together and contributing to your success.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 950000}
